const NEWS_URL="https://newsapi.org/v2/top-headlines?country=us&apiKey=".concat(API_KEY);const ExternalNews=()=>{const[articles,setArticles]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{fetchExternalNews();},[]);const fetchExternalNews=async()=>{setLoading(true);try{const res=await axios.get(NEWS_URL);setArticles(res.data.articles);}catch(err){setError('Failed to fetch external news.');}setLoading(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{maxWidth:"md",sx:{mt:4},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{display:"flex",justifyContent:"space-between",alignItems:"center",mb:2,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",fontWeight:700,children:"External News"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{href:"/news",variant:"outlined",children:"Back to News Feed"})]}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{display:"flex",justifyContent:"center",mt:4,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CircularProgress,{})}):error?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Alert,{severity:"error",children:error}):articles.map((article,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{initial:{opacity:0,y:20},animate:{opacity:1,y:0},transition:{delay:0.05*idx},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{sx:{mb:3,display:'flex'},children:[article.urlToImage&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardMedia,{component:"img",sx:{width:200},image:article.urlToImage,alt:article.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',flex:1},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardContent,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",fontWeight:600,children:article.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"body2",color:"text.secondary",mb:1,children:[article.source.name," \u2022 ",new Date(article.publishedAt).toLocaleString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body1",mb:1,children:article.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{href:article.url,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener",variant:"contained",size:"small",children:"Read More"})]})})]})},idx))]});};export default ExternalNews;
